name: Skyland Wars
summary: Skyland Wars is a strategy game set in the world of sky islands. In this fantasy-filled sky world, you can send airship teams to freely navigate the sky, gather resources, and drive away roaming air pirates to construct your own sky city. You can also explore ruins and dungeons full of unknowns and challenges. Each adventure is a completely new experience, as you delve into dungeons with your heroes and troops, searching for ancient treasures while resisting unpredictable enemies and traps.
